```{r}
library(bnlearn)
library(Rgraphviz)
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("data/listings_0320.csv")

target_cols <- c("bedrooms",
                 "bathrooms",
                 "price",
                 "property_type",
                 "neighbourhood_cleansed",
                 "zestimate",
                 "ROI")
```


```{r}
dag <- model2network("[Neigh][Beds|Prop][Baths|Prop][Prop][Zest|Beds:Baths:Neigh:Prop][Rent|Beds:Baths:Neigh][ROI|Zest:Rent]")
print(class(dag))
graphviz.plot(dag)

```
